content:
During the last day, the Aviation of Defense forces has struck 10 areas of concentration of live power, weapons and military equipment and one enemy.

About thisreportedGeneral Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

Divisions of rocket troops have led to:

  • 1 area of concentration of personnel,
  • 4 points of management,
  • 2 air defense agents,
  • 1 artillery tool,
  • 1 Station of the Reb,
  • 1 rapeseed station of the invaders.

"At the same time, our warriors continue to be active in the occupation troops of losses in living strength and equipment, depleting the enemy along the entire line of combat collision," - the message reads.

As reportedArmyinform, during the last day in the Novopavlovsky direction of the Russian troops 34 times tried to break through Ukrainian defense.
title: The Armed Forces hit the management points and air defense means of the Russians
description: This was reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Divisions of missile troops ...
author: Army Inform
